DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect habituation diet different type carbohydrate ( simple-carb , refined-carb , unrefined-carb ) select Cardiovascular Disease ( CVD ) risk indicator .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Carbohydrate Type Cardiovascular Disease ( CVD ) Risk Indicators
DOC.detailed_description: The objective pilot study determine relative comparability isocaloric exchange ( 1 ) refined-carb simple-carb ( 2 ) refined-carb unrefined-carb , establish emerge CVD risk indicator . To achieve goal , subject moderate dyslipidemia ( LDL cholesterol > 100mg/dL ) consume diet enrich 3 type carbohydrate ( simple-carb , refined-carb unrefined-carb ) accord randomize , cross-over design .

function assess serum creatinine blood urea nitrogen Normal liver function assess serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase alkaline phosphatase Normal thyroid function assess serum thyroid stimulate hormone concentration Normal gastrointestinal function Fasting plasma glucose concentration < 120 mg/dL Normotensive without medication Nonsmoker least 12 month Alcohol intake less 7 drink per week
